source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_00<tab>Lue-Reeq wishes to confront an uncomfortable truth.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_00<tab>Lue-Reeq a une confession à vous faire.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_01<tab>Lue-Reeq is well aware that his martial prowess pales in comparison to yours, and that he is far more likely to hinder any effort to slay Andreia than to aid it. Now that the Virtue travels in the company of several eaters, a clever strategy is more important than ever, and to that end, the bounty hunter proposes the manufacture of a device that can generate a loud enough noise, as it was such a noise that rendered Renda-Rae powerless when she first faced Balam<var 1F /var>Quitz. Before you can depart for the Crystalline Mean to seek an artisan's assistance, however, a servant of Lue-Reeq's lord father appears and demands that he renounce his chosen career and return to Eulmore at once, else he will be disowned. After a moment's hesitation, the young hunter marshals his courage and declares that the only family he acknowledges is Miss Olvara, his wet nurse. The die is cast, and you may now concentrate on the task at hand.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_01<tab>Grâce à Olvara, Lue-Reeq a eu l'idée d'un stratagème qui pourrait vous donner un avantage certain face à Andreia. Rendez-vous à la halle du Juste et parlez à Loythe pour concrétiser le plan de Lue-Reeq.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_02<tab>Loythe of the Crystalline Mean is amused by your request for a noisemaking device, but is more than willing to design and craft it─provided you and Lue-Reeq can procure the necessary materials. Said materials will require one to travel to the far corners of Norvrandt and back, and so you steel yourself for another long journey, only for Lue-Reeq to declare that he has imposed upon you too much. You are to wait in the Crystarium while he alone fetches the various materials.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_02<tab>Loythe vous a donné une liste de matériaux à réunir. Lue-Reeq vous a assuré qu'il n'aurait aucun mal à s'en charger lui-même, et il vous a demandé de l'attendre à la taverne des Marches nébuleuses.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_03<tab>When you are rejoined by Lue-Reeq, you are surprised not only to learn that he managed to procure every item requested, but worked closely with Loythe to learn how to craft his secret weapon by himself. The noisemaker arrows, as he calls them, should serve to incapacitate Andreia in the heat of battle. With these final preparations complete, you depart for Rak'tika once more.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_03<tab>Lue-Reeq est revenu vous trouver, en possession de “flèches soniques” qui devraient permettre d'étourdir Andreia. Le moment d'affronter le purgateur est arrivé... Rendez-vous aux marécages du Citia, dans la forêt de Rak'tika, et parlez à Lue-Reeq.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_04<tab>Though you have known many a harrowing battle, the fight against Andreia and her party of eaters proves to be one of your greatest challenges yet. Fortunately, Lue-Reeq's noisemaker arrows serve to turn the tide, and after defeating each of her comrades in turn, the Virtue soon falls.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_04<tab>Grâce à votre parfaite coordination avec Lue-Reeq, vous avez réussi à terrasser Andreia après un combat aux multiples re<var 16 /var>bon<var 16 /var>dis<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ments. Il est temps d'avoir une pensée pour Renda-Rae, dans la forêt de Rak'tika.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_05<tab>As the essence of Andreia begins to dissipate, you glimpse the last vestiges of Renda-Rae, the fallen Warrior of Light. She speaks of guilt and of love for her comrades, of the fear that gripped her heart and the courage that blossomed from it. Of a last, desperate attempt to save all she and her friends held dear, knowing what it would cost, knowing that it would surely fail...for it could be no other way. The shade's parting words leave Lue-Reeq confused, and so you explain to him how the Warriors of Light stood valiantly against the Flood of Light and sacrificed their lives to halt its advance. For his ignorance, the hunter is ashamed, though he hopes in helping lay Renda-Rae's soul to rest he has earned a modicum of forgiveness.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez assisté à une apparition de Renda-Rae, qui s'est confiée à vous avant de disparaître... Pour de bon<var 1D /var>? Pressé d'annoncer la nouvelle à Olvara, Lue-Reeq s'est hâté vers Le Vestibule. Allez le rejoindre et adressez-vous à la vieille nourrice.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_06<tab>Olvara is proud and relieved to see you and Lue-Reeq return, and as one hunter to another she thanks you for saving her hero's soul. She promises to preserve the truth of her tale so that future generations will know the whole of her story─of Renda-Rae, the greatest hunter who ever lived, and a true friend. Having said your good-byes, all that remains is to return to the Crystarium to claim the bounty and celebrate your victory.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_06<tab>Olvara vous a félicités pour votre victoire sur Andreia, et vous a remerciés d'avoir permis à l'âme de Renda-Rae de trouver le repos. Maintenant, il faut fêter ça<var 1D /var>! Rendez-vous aux Marches nébuleuses et parlez à Lue-Reeq pour trinquer à votre succès.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_07<tab>Over a final feast, Lue-Reeq presses you to reveal the whole story of how you know so much about the Warriors of Light, and so you tell him of how you faced them in the Source, as the Warriors of Darkness, and the terrible sacrifice they had to make to even have the chance to save the First. This revelation only serves to reinforce the conclusion Lue-Reeq has already reached: that he does not have what it takes to walk the same path as you, much as he has enjoyed your time together. But there is no shame in it, for he has also realized how important Miss Olvara is to him, and so he would instead return to Kholusia and repay her for the kindness she showed him in his youth by caring for her in her old age. Thus ends the glorious partnership that was Reeq and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─for now, at least, for who can say what the future holds?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_SEQ_07<tab>Vous avez raconté vos visions de Renda-Rae et des Guerriers de la Lumière à Lue-Reeq, ainsi que vos récentes aventures dans le premier reflet. Impressionné par vos prouesses, il s'est résolu à abandonner son idée de vous suivre dans vos pérégrinations pour relever un défi à sa portée<var 1D /var>: s'occuper d'Olvara. N'hésitez pas à rendre visite à Lue-Reeq au Vestibule, et qui sait, peut-être reformer votre duo de légende un jour<var 1D /var>!

target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Loythe, à la halle du Juste

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_TODO_01<tab>Wait for Lue-Reeq to return.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_TODO_01<tab>Attendre à l'endroit indiqué

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_100_000<tab>I do hope you continue to remain good friends from now on...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_100_000<tab>J'espère que votre amitié avec Reeq durera toujours.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, my friend, my partner─I trust you are ready?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, <var 08 E905 ((ma)) ((mon)) /var> partenaire, <var 08 E905 ((ma meilleure amie)) ((mon meilleur ami)) /var><var 1D /var>! Ça y est, notre duo est rrreformé, et le jour de la confrontation est arrivé...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_001<tab>Good, good. That is very good indeed, for before we depart to face Andreia for what I pray is the final time, I have a confession to make...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_001<tab>Mais avant d'aller défier Andreia, je dois à ma grrrande honte te faire un aveu...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_002<tab>I...I may have been somewhat misleading when I intimated the tremendousness of my martial prowess. In truth, it...rather pales in comparison to yours.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_002<tab>Il se peut que j'aie dressé un portrait quelque peu <var 1A 02 /var>flatteur<var 1A 01 /var> de mes compétences. Comparrrées aux tiennes, elles sont... plus que modestes.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_Q1_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_A1_000_001<tab>Uh huh.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_A1_000_001<tab>Je l'ai toujours su.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_A1_000_002<tab>Do tell.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_A1_000_002<tab>Non, vraiment<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_003<tab>...I gather you were not unaware of this. Truly, you are as perceptive as you are mighty.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_003<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>? Évidemment, on peut rrrien te cacher...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_004<tab>You must be terribly crestfallen, I am sure. It is my deepest regret that I allowed you to labor under the misapprehension that we were equals for so long.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_004<tab>Oui, c'est la vérrrité... Je suis désolé de te faire cette révélation au dernier moment.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_005<tab>In my defense, I must say that when I realized what an exceedingly powerful warrior you truly are, I was dumbstruck. I struggled to conceive of how even to broach the subject...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_005<tab>Pour ma défense, quand j'ai réalisé <var 08 E905 ((quelle)) ((quel)) /var> in<var 16 /var>crrroya<var 16 /var>ble <var 08 E905 ((combattante)) ((combattant)) /var> tu étais, j'étais sous le choc. Je savais pas comment aborder le sujet...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_006<tab>Furthermore, I must admit that great majority─nay, all of our efforts to hone our skills in preparation for the battle to come have been entirely for my benefit, that the disparity between us might not be so readily apparent.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_006<tab>Toutes ces histoires de test, ces combats pour soi-disant mieux connaître notre ennemi ou encore travailler nos com<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>nai<var 16 /var>sons en conditions réelles... C'était des mensonges, je cherrrchais juste à t'observer pour apprendre...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_007<tab>To think that my insecurity drove me to postpone this fateful day for so long...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_007<tab>Avec ce temps perrrdu par ma faute, Andreia a eu tout le loisir de former sa petite meute de lieutenants. Au lieu d'un purgateur, il nous faut maintenant en affronter cinq...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_008<tab>In my cowardice I allowed Andreia to assemble a party of followers. Where before we might have only to contend with the one foe, we must now confront five. And for all my preparation, I am still no more likely to be an asset to you than a hindrance.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_008<tab>Le pire dans tout ça, c'est que mes piètres prrrogrès sont loin d'être à la hauteur du défi qui nous attend par ma faute... Tout ce qui risque d'arriver, c'est que je te gêne dans un moment critique de l'af<var 16 /var>fron<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_009<tab>But perhaps that need not be the case. In discussing this grim reality with Miss Olvara while you were away, we hit upon a potential stratagem.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_009<tab>Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, lorsque j'ai partagé mes crrraintes avec Olvara, elle m'a soufflé une idée qui pourrait bien nous donner un avantage décisif sur notre ennemie...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_010<tab>Recall you Renda-Rae's greatest strength and weakness─her preternatural hearing? We can be reasonably certain that Andreia is possessed of it as well.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_010<tab>Vous vous souvenez sûrement de ce qui faisait de Renda-Rae une chasseuse hors pair, et qui a causé sa perte au final<var 1D /var>? On peut penser qu'Andreia est elle aussi dotée d'une ouïe ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nelle.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_011<tab>Therefore, if you were to fashion a device that could produce a loud noise at will, you could use it to secure an advantage in your battle.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_011<tab>Avec un appareil capable d'émettre un puissant son strident, vous devriez pouvoir l'affaiblir suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment pour la forcer à baisser sa garde.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_012<tab>What I lack in strength of arms I may make up for with guile. While it will not guarantee us victory, it will surely bring us one step closer...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_012<tab>Je suis peut-être pas le meilleur combattant, mais je peux me rrrendre utile dif<var 16 /var>fé<var 16 /var>rem<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>! Maintenant, penchons-nous sur la fabrication de cet appareil...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_IMPASSIVESERVANT_000_013<tab>A thousand pardons, Master Reeq, but I am come to deliver a message from your lord father.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_IMPASSIVESERVANT_000_013<tab>Veuillez m'excuser. Maître Reeq, je suis ici pour vous transmettre un message de votre père.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_014<tab>Daddy? What does he want with me now?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_014<tab>De mon père<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce que ça peut êtrrre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_IMPASSIVESERVANT_000_015<tab>It has come to your lord father's attention that you have been engaged in the hunting of sin eaters, in gross violation of Eulmore's most sacred values. He commands you to cease all such activities at once and return to the city forthwith.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_IMPASSIVESERVANT_000_015<tab>Votre père vous demande de cesser toute chasse au purgateur, une activité contraire aux valeurs eulmoriennes les plus sacrées. Il exige que vous regagniez la demeure familiale sur-le-champ.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_IMPASSIVESERVANT_100_015<tab>It has come to your lord father's attention that you have acquitted yourself rather poorly as a bounty hunter and have brought terrible shame upon your family name. He commands you to cease all such activities at once and return to the city forthwith.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_IMPASSIVESERVANT_100_015<tab>Votre père vous demande d'abandonner votre activité de chasseur de primes, qui a d'après lui suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment déshonoré votre maison. Il exige que vous regagniez la demeure familiale sur-le-champ.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_IMPASSIVESERVANT_000_016<tab>Should you fail to do so, you will be stripped of your citizenship and family name. No further financial assistance will be provided.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_IMPASSIVESERVANT_000_016<tab>Si vous refusez, votre nom ainsi que votre citoyenneté vous seront retirés, et plus aucune aide financière ne vous sera jamais fournie.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_017<tab>Oh...Oh dear...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_017<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_018<tab>You may tell my father and my mother the following: that I am Lue-Reeq, proud bounty hunter, slayer of sin eaters. That I have no intention of renouncing this cause, and that they are free to do as they deem fit.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_018<tab>Voici ce que vous allez dire à mes parents. Je suis Lue-Reeq, chasseur de primes et tueur de purgateurs. J'ai aucunement l'intention de rrrenoncer, donc qu'ils fassent ce qu'ils veulent, ça m'importe peu.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_019<tab>Tell them...that if they have no son, then I have no parents─that I have no family save Miss Olvara, who has shown me more love than they ever have!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_019<tab>Dites-leurrr aussi qu'ils se sont de toute façon jamais occupés de moi, et que ma seule famille, c'est Olvara<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_IMPASSIVESERVANT_000_020<tab>Very good, Master Reeq. I shall deliver your reply to them at once.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_IMPASSIVESERVANT_000_020<tab>Très bien, Maître Reeq. Je vais leur faire parvenir votre réponse im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_021<tab>Right. Now that that's settled, we can get to work crafting that giant noisemaker of ours. Let us consult with the craftsmen of the Crystalline Mean at once.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_021<tab>Je me sens plus léger, tout d'un coup. Bon, pour fabriquer notre appareil, je prrropose qu'on demande conseil à un artisan expérimenté. On se retrouve à la halle du Juste<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_022<tab>I daresay you lit a fire in him, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I never thought I'd see the day when he'd muster the courage to say anything like that to his parents...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_022<tab>Je crois que vous avez allumé une flamme en lui, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Je ne pensais pas le voir un jour tenir tête à ses parents ainsi... Quel garçon courageux il est devenu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_026<tab>Thank you for being a friend to Reeq. For the longest time he struggled to find his way, but ever since he met you, he has carried himself with a new sense of purpose. A renewed understanding of who he is and who he wants to be.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_026<tab>Je ne pensais pas voir un jour Reeq tenir tête à ses parents ainsi... Quel garçon courageux il est devenu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_027<tab>For all my time in the Crystarium, I cannot recall ever visiting the Crystalline Mean. Nevertheless, I am sure there is someone here who can assist us.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_027<tab>À vrrrai dire, c'est la première fois que je mets les pieds à la halle du Juste. J'espère qu'on trouvera ce qu'on est venus chercher<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LOYTHE_100_030<tab>Hmm? What's all this, then? You got something what needs making?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LOYTHE_100_030<tab>Oui<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce qui vous amène à la halle du Juste<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_031<tab>Indeed I do, good sir. I wish to commission the production of a device that can generate a tremendously loud sound. It must be small and light enough to be carried by a single individual as well.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_031<tab>On aimerait faire fabriquer quelque chose... Un appareil capable d'émettre un son strrrident et assourdissant, et qui soit suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment petit pour pouvoir le transporter.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LOYTHE_100_032<tab>Ain't that one of the stranger requests I've heard... Well, if it's just noise you want, then I'd wager we could make do with a special blend of firesand.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LOYTHE_100_032<tab>En voilà une drôle de commande<var 1D /var>! Enfin, tant que vous payez la note... Pour ce dont vous avez besoin, je pense qu'une mixture à base de poudre à canon devrait faire l'affaire. J'ai ma petite idée sur la forme finale de l'objet...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LOYTHE_100_033<tab>Aye, I think I've got just the recipe for your needs. I'll need some choice ingredients, mind─and you'll need to go and fetch them for me.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LOYTHE_100_033<tab>Par contre, faire du bruit est une chose, mais fabriquer un appareil de taille réduite en est une autre<var 1D /var>! Je vais avoir besoin de matériaux bien particuliers, et c'est à vous de me les fournir.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_034<tab>F-Fetch... Ahem. What precisely is it that you require?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_034<tab>Aucun prrroblème<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce qu'il vous faut<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LOYTHE_100_035<tab>Well, there's this one particular beastie native to Kholusia what's got a singular diet and leaves these massive dung piles─the fresher the better, if it please. A few varieties of grasses native to Rak'tika... Oh, and some iron ore from Amh Araeng. I can give you a list if you like.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LOYTHE_100_035<tab>Voyons voir... Quelques herbes sauvages de la forêt de Rak'tika, du fer noir d'Amh Araeng et... des excréments d'un monstre qui vit sur l'île de Kholusia.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_036<tab>To wit, I will need to travel to the far corners of Norvrandt and back...? Oh dear, this is rather more involved than I...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_036<tab>... Des excréments<var 1D /var>!? En grrros, vous voulez qu'on fasse le tour de Norvrandt... Vous vous rendez compte de l'effort surhumain que ça demande<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_037<tab>No, no─no more excuses! I will do whatever must needs be done to see this through to the end!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_037<tab>... Euh, oubliez ce que j'ai dit. Vous aurrrez tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour fabriquer notre appareil.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_038<tab>My friend, I will not impose these tasks upon you. I insist that you remain here while I go and fetch the required materials.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_038<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu peux me faire confiance, je me charge de tout. Plus d'excuses, dorrrénavant je fais face à mes res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>tés<var 1D /var>! Va m'attendre à la taverne, ça sera pas long.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_CRAFTSMAN03278_000_030<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_CRAFTSMAN03278_000_030<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_CRAFTSMAN03278_000_032<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_CRAFTSMAN03278_000_032<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_CRAFTSMAN03278_000_033<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_CRAFTSMAN03278_000_033<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_CRAFTSMAN03278_000_035<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_CRAFTSMAN03278_000_035<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LOYTHE_100_040<tab>Huh, he gonna be all right getting all that stuff by himself? I mean, if it were you, I'd not think twice about it...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LOYTHE_100_040<tab>Votre ami est parti sans noter la liste des matériaux... Vous pensez qu'il s'en souviendra<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_CRAFTSMAN03278_000_040<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_CRAFTSMAN03278_000_040<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_050<tab>It...it was...a series of surprisingly harrowing experiences...but in the end I managed to obtain the materials necessary for the construction of my secret weapon.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_050<tab>J'ai réuni les matérrriaux tant bien que mal... Et j'ai même fabriqué moi-même l'instrument de notre futur triomphe<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_051<tab>That gentleman was rather accommodating. Despite being somewhat put out that I had not any gil to pay him for his labor, he was nevertheless willing to teach me how to craft the arrows myself. He said he found my industriousness...endearing.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_051<tab>Quand j'ai dû avouer à l'artisan que je n'avais pas de quoi le payer, il m'a fait cadeau des plans en me félicitant pour mes efforts. C'est bien la prrremière fois que je crée quelque chose de mes mains<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_052<tab>I must confess, despite being utterly exhausted by all this busywork, it has been somewhat refreshing.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_052<tab>Finalement, point d'engin sophistiqué, mais une série de flèches spéciales émettant un sifflement strrrident lorsqu'on les décoche.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_100_052<tab>And now that my noisemaker arrows are ready, I cannot wait to put them to the proof! If all goes to plan, the explosions should be loud enough to incapacitate Andreia for a time.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_100_052<tab>Je les ai baptisées... “flèches soniques”<var 1D /var>! Grrrâce à elles, on va pouvoir affaiblir Andreia<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_053<tab>Let us put an end to her tale, my friend, and in so doing write the opening of ours─that of Reeq and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, bounty hunters extraordinaire! Come─Rak'tika and glory await!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_053<tab>Cette fois, c'est la bonne. Cap sur les marécages du Citia, pour écrirrre la légende de Reeq et <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_060<tab>If I may make one small request before we begin: please, for the love of the gods, please try not to succumb to any visions of people's pasts! This really could not be a worse time...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_060<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, pas de vision du passé cette fois, d'accorrrd<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_100<tab>Well? Are you still with me in the here and now?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_100<tab>Ça va<var 1D /var>? Tu es <var 08 E905 ((prrrête)) ((prrrêt)) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_101<tab>Excellent! Then we can attend to the task at hand without worry. Let us lay to rest our fellow hunters and grant Renda-Rae the peace a hero deserves!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_101<tab>Le grand moment est arrivé. Terrassons ces purgateurs pour libérer les âmes de Renda-Rae et des autrrres chasseurs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Defeat Andreia!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Vainquez Andreia<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>I'll distract Andreia with a noisemaker arrow.
Seize the opening to strike!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>Je m'occupe d'entrrraver Andreia avec les flèches soniques, profites-en pour l'attaquer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>Here goes nothing...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_001<tab>Voyons voir ce que tu dis de notre petite surprrrise...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_ANDREIA_BATTLETALK_000_002<tab>Ugh... <groan>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_ANDREIA_BATTLETALK_000_002<tab>Grrraaah...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_003<tab>It worked! It really worked! I can't believe it...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_003<tab>Ça fonctionne<var 1D /var>! Vite, c'est maintenant ou jamais<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_004<tab>Huh!? Are they...defending her? Dammit!
We'll have to deal with them first!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_004<tab>... Ils prrrotègent Andreia<var 1D /var>!? Pas le choix, il faut s'en débarrasser avant<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_002_004<tab>Godsdamn you, Lanbyrd! I'm sorry you're dead but you don't
have to be such a bloody arse about it!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_002_004<tab>Satané Lanbyrd<var 1D /var>! Même en purrrgateur, il faut toujours que tu me déranges<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_001_004<tab>That's it! Only two more to go!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_001_004<tab>Bien joué<var 1D /var>! Plus que deux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_005<tab>I'll draw off Andreia! You handle the knight!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_005<tab>Je m'occupe d'Andreia, prrrends l'autre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_006<tab>Heads up! Arrows incoming!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_006<tab>Attention<var 1D /var>! Il pleut des flèches<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_007<tab>Now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Now's our chance!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_007<tab>J'arrive, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_008<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_008<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_009<tab>Gah! That bloody knight is in the way. Dispatch him first!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_009<tab>Il continue à prrrotéger Andreia... Réglons-lui son compte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_001_009<tab>It's just us and Andreia now! It's time for Reeq and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> to write a new legend for the ages!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_001_009<tab>Enfin face à face avec Andrrreia<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_003_009<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, to me!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_003_009<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, parrr ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_010<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_010<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_011<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_011<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_ANDREIA_BATTLETALK_000_012<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_ANDREIA_BATTLETALK_000_012<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_013<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_013<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_014<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_014<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_ANDREIA_BATTLETALK_000_015<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_ANDREIA_BATTLETALK_000_015<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_016<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_000_016<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_001_016<tab>Rest in peace, Renda-Rae...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_001_016<tab>Rrrepose en paix, Renda-Rae...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_001_017<tab>I...I really thought I...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_BATTLETALK_001_017<tab>Ici prend fin... notrrre légende...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_110<tab>We...we won... Even seeing it and saying it, it hardly feels real...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_110<tab>On a rrréussi<var 1D /var>! On a vaincu Andreia<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_111<tab>Huh? What's that you've got there?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_111<tab>Qu'est-ce qu'il y a<var 1D /var>? Tu as trrrouvé quelque chose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_112<tab>Wicked white, you're...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_112<tab>C'est toi...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_100_112<tab>You're Renda-Rae. The real Renda-Rae...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_100_112<tab>... Renda-Rae<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_RENDARAE_000_113<tab>(-Renda-Rae's Shade-)I should've never betrayed your trust. Never again, I swore. Never again.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_RENDARAE_000_113<tab>(-Apparition de Renda-Rae-)Le jour où mes compagnons sont venus à mon secours contre B'alam Quitze, je me suis prrromis de ne jamais les quitter.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_RENDARAE_000_114<tab>(-Renda-Rae's Shade-)Balam<var 1F /var>Quitz, the Shadowkeeper, the Flood─come what may, we would face it together. No matter how hard it got, or how terrified I was...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_RENDARAE_000_114<tab>(-Apparition de Renda-Rae-)Même lorsqu'Ardbert a combattu le roi de l'Ombre et fait le serrrment de sauver le monde, je l'ai suivi, alors que j'étais terrorisée.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_RENDARAE_000_115<tab>(-Renda-Rae's Shade-)That's what it means to let someone into your heart, knowing full well that nothing lasts forever. To welcome the fear, and the pain. The sorrow. When I lost my parents. When we laid the keeper low. You felt it too, didn't you?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_RENDARAE_000_115<tab>(-Apparition de Renda-Rae-)Pour mes amis, j'ai tout abandonné, jusqu'à ma liberté. J'ai même délaissé mes propres parents, qui sont morrrts en mon absence, sans que je le sache...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_RENDARAE_000_116<tab>(-Renda-Rae's Shade-)To place our faith in a desperate, hopeless attempt to save everyone...and to see it amount to naught in the end.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_RENDARAE_000_116<tab>(-Apparition de Renda-Rae-)Mais je ne suis pas la seule. Comme moi, mes compagnons Guerriers de la Lumière ont tous fait d'imporrrtants sacrifices pour sauver ce monde... tout ça pour échouer.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_RENDARAE_000_117<tab>(-Renda-Rae's Shade-)What else could we do but offer up that tiny remainder in a final, futile effort? Even knowing, deep down, it was worth but a few moments more...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_RENDARAE_000_117<tab>(-Apparition de Renda-Rae-)Mais lorsqu'ils ont décidé de faire le sacrrrifice ultime, je ne pouvais que les suivre... Pas pour sauver le monde, non, mais pour... <var 1A 02 /var>eux<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_118<tab>What is this...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_118<tab>... Quoi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_RENDARAE_000_119<tab>(-Renda-Rae's Shade-)You gave me fear...and that fear gave me strength...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_RENDARAE_000_119<tab>(-Apparition de Renda-Rae-)Je voulais accompagner mes amis, ce que j'avais de plus prrrécieux, jusqu'au bout...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_120<tab>Wait! There's so much I want to ask!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_120<tab>... Attends<var 1D /var>! J'ai tant de choses à te demander<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_121<tab>I don't understand. What was she talking about?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_121<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, qu'est-ce que ça signifie...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_100_121<tab>It's not right. It's not fair. Heroes sacrificing themselves for nothing. Becoming villains. Being forgotten...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_100_121<tab>Tu veux dire que les Guerriers de la Lumière ont sacrrrifié leur vie pour se rendre dans un autre monde, tout ça dans le but de sauver le nôtre...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_122<tab>...Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I could have never gotten this far without your help.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_122<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je te suis prrrofondément re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sant. Grâce à ton aide, j'ai enfin réalisé mon rêve de vaincre Andreia.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_100_122<tab>I had no idea who Renda-Rae or any of the other Warriors of Light truly were. 'Twas all ancient history to me. Why would I care who some eaters once were?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_100_122<tab>Dire que j'étais perrrsuadé, comme la majorité des habitants de Norvrandt, que les Guerriers de la Lumière étaient à l'origine du Déluge... En fait, ils n'ont rien de “grands pécheurs”, bien au contraire.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_100_123<tab>I was no better than my parents, judging them out of hand. Dismissing their sacrifice, not bothering to look deeper. It made it all the easier to pursue Andreia for my own amusement.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_100_123<tab>J'ai toujours méprisé ceux qui, comme mes parents, détournent le regard du monde qui les entoure pour jouirrr de leurs petits plaisirs. Mais finalement, je me rends compte que je n'étais pas bien différent...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_100_124<tab>I pray I've made up for it in part by helping to lay Renda-Rae's soul to rest...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_100_124<tab>Au moins, en venant à bout d'Andreia, j'ai peut-être permis à l'esprit de Renda-Rae de rrreposer en paix...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_123<tab>Miss Olvara is probably worried sick about us both. I...we should return to Kholusia and let her know we're all right.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_123<tab>Il me tarrrde tellement d'annoncer la nouvelle à Olvara. Plus tard, j'aimerais que tu me racontes ce que tu sais. Toute la vérité sur Renda-Rae, et les Guerriers de la Lumière...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_130<tab>I can't wait to tell Miss Olvara everything! And I should definitely use some of the bounty to treat her...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_130<tab>Olvara a versé une petite larrrme en apprenant la nouvelle. Elle était encore plus émue que moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_140<tab>My little Reeq, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Congratulations on a job well done!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_140<tab>Fé<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tions à tous les deux pour votre victoire sur Andreia<var 1D /var>! Et j'aimerais aussi vous remercier pour une raison plus personnelle...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_141<tab>And from one hunter to another, thank you for helping Renda-Rae to achieve a measure of peace. She was a hero to me too, and it broke my heart to know what had become of her...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_141<tab>Comme Reeq, c'est mon admiration pour Renda-Rae qui m'a poussée à devenir chasseuse de primes. Lorsque j'ai appris que mon modèle était devenu un purgateur, j'étais dévastée.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_142<tab>To have your legacy tarnished so, to have the world call you villain, even still. But at least I can take comfort in knowing she can finally enjoy a long rest.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_142<tab>Maintenant que vous avez permis à son âme de trouver le repos, je suis moi aussi apaisée. Même si les gens ont fait d'elle une “grande pécheresse”, elle restera à jamais mon héroïne...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_143<tab>Whatever others may say, we will preserve the truth in story and song. Renda-Rae, the bravest hunter there ever was! And, more importantly, a true friend to those she held dear.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_143<tab>Pour moi aussi. Désorrrmais, c'est à mon tour de transmettre l'histoire de Renda-Rae, la courageuse chasseuse, aux générations futures. Le véritable récit de son combat, avec ses alliés de toujours...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_144<tab>I can only hope to measure up to her example someday! For now, however, I say we return to the Crystarium and raise a glass in celebration!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_144<tab>Mais avant ça, direction les Marches nébuleuses pour recevoir la récompense... et fêter ça avec un bon festin, bien sûrrr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_148<tab>...So she brought down Balam<var 1F /var>Quitz not alone, but with the aid of her comrades? Hmm...it may not be the story I was taught, but somehow...somehow it rings truer to my ear...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_OLVARA_000_148<tab>Mon cœur est apaisé de savoir que l'âme de Renda-Rae peut désormais reposer en paix. Même si les gens ont fait d'elle une “grande pécheresse”, elle restera à jamais mon héroïne...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_150<tab>Andreia's bounty has been paid to us in full, my friend! So come─let us eat, drink, and be merry!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_150<tab>En t'attendant, j'en ai profité pour empocher la récompense<var 1D /var>! Commençons par trrrinquer à notre victoire, une longue nuit nous attend<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_151<tab>I've been meaning to ask, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...but I have the impression you are rather more acquainted with these Warriors of Light than you've been letting on. What exactly do you know about them?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_151<tab>Bon, et si tu me racontais<var 1D /var>? Ce que tu as vu, la vérrritable histoire de Renda-Rae et des Guerriers de la Lumière. Et puis la tienne, aussi<var 1D /var>! Tu as dû en vivre, des aventures in<var 16 /var>croya<var 16 /var>bles...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_152<tab>That...that is so preposterous a tale that I have no choice but to assume it is true. Offering up their lives to first cross the rift, then to halt the Flood... Wicked white...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_152<tab>Ça alors... Si je te connaissais pas, je jurrrerais que tu as tout inventé<var 1D /var>! Si les gens savaient que les “grands pécheurs” ont en fait offert leur vie pour la planète, et que la vague de Lumière s'est arrêtée grâce à eux...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_153<tab>It must've taken her so much courage to see it through in those final moments.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_153<tab>Quant à Renda-Rae, elle a tenu la promesse qu'elle s'était faite de suivre ses compagnons où qu'ils aillent, “à la vie, à la morrrt”.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_154<tab>A courage born not of a desire for glory or dedication to an ideal, but of fear and love for those with whom she had forged unshakable bonds. Her comrades.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_154<tab>Dire que j'ai passé tellement de temps à me vanter de mes soi-disant compagnons d'aventurrre... Aujourd'hui, j'ai enfin compris qu'une véritable amitié, ça ne s'achète pas.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_155<tab>I won't pretend that we have anything even approaching such a powerful connection, but I would like to think that if you were in mortal peril that I would fly to your side without hesitation...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_155<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu es la première personne que je peux réellement considérer comme <var 08 E905 ((une amie)) ((un ami)) /var>. Si je te voyais encore te prrrécipiter vers le danger, je te suivrais sans hésiter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_156<tab>Having said that, if I were tested as Renda-Rae were─if I were challenged to offer up my life for others, without even knowing if it would amount to aught...I doubt I could rise to the occasion.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_156<tab>Par contre, de là à abandonner pour toujours Olvara ou donner ma vie comme l'a fait Renda-Rae, il y a un pas que je suis pas cerrrtain de pouvoir franchir...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_157<tab>I am a child and a fool who knows little of the world. I have been coddled and spoiled, and have only just tasted the bitter fruits of life that you and countless others sup on daily.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_157<tab>Et puis, à côté des récits épiques de tes exploits, ma vie de chasseur de primes me paraît bien in<var 16 /var>si<var 16 /var>gni<var 16 /var>fiante désormais... Et je ne crois pas avoir les épaules pour porrrter le destin du monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_158<tab>You are made of sterner stuff, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Far sterner than me...and that is why I know I can never walk your path.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_158<tab>On joue pas dans la même catégorie, toi et moi. Je crrrains qu'il faille se rendre à l'évidence... Je pourrai pas t'assister pour tes prochaines aventures.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_Q2_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_A2_000_001<tab>Do you wish you could?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_A2_000_001<tab>Tu pensais vraiment m'accompagner<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_A2_000_002<tab>No shame in that.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_A2_000_002<tab>Tu as mieux à faire, je crois.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_159<tab>How could I not? I cannot recall a time I have felt happier and more alive than when I have traveled with you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_159<tab>Bien sûr<var 1D /var>! J'avais bien l'intention de faire équipe avec toi jusqu'à la retraite, mais j'ai dû revoir mes plans, à contre-cœurrr...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_160<tab>Oh, but there is! I cannot recall a time I have felt happier and more alive than when I have traveled with you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_160<tab>Oui, tu as rrraison. C'est donc ici que nos routes se séparent...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_161<tab>But you have countless other journeys ahead of you, don't you? For you are destined for greater challenges─whereas I am suited to rather more pedestrian affairs. Know your limits, as Miss Olvara used to say.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_161<tab>Pendant que tu combattras pour sauver le monde, je me consacrrrerai à une tâche plus à ma portée<var 1D /var>: m'occuper d'Olvara.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_162<tab>Meeting her again after all these years─seeing how much older and more frail she'd become made me realize how little time together we have left. She shouldn't have to live out her days living alone and in squalor.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_162<tab>Comme tu as pu le voir, elle est âgée, et les conditions dans lesquelles elle vit sont loin d'être idéales. Après tout ce qu'elle a fait pour moi, je crrrois que c'est la moindre des choses de lui rendre la pareille...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_163<tab>I have decided it will not be so. I shall return to Kholusia and attend to her needs, for I would do my utmost to repay the love and kindness that made me the man I am today.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_163<tab>La rendre heurrreuse, voilà ma nouvelle mission<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_164<tab>Therefore, though it pains me to say it, I fear this celebration must also mark the end─or at the very least a tentative suspension─of the glorious partnership that was Reeq and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, bounty hunters extraordinaire.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_164<tab>Attention, ça ne veut pas dirrre pour autant que notre association est finie pour de bon<var 1D /var>! Quand tu viendras me rendre visite au Vestibule, on pourra ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nellement reformer notre équipe de choc...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_165<tab>Should you ever find yourself in Kholusia, however, do come and pay us a visit!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA351_03278_LUEREEQ_000_165<tab>Rrreeq et <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, le duo de légende<var 1D /var>!
